item.title: Migrating from Jekyll to Hugo
item.description: This post contains information about the migration of my Github development-cheat-sheets page (this site) from Jekyll.

item.title: Github
item.description: Github is a popular public Source Code Repository (SRC) which was recently purchased by Microsoft?. As the name suggests Github uses git for use of the repository.
